summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation and to North Administrative Center and Park; making an appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund for said department's pro rata share of the final installment payment upon a note and mortgage executed in connection with the City's purchase of certain property in the southeast one-quarter of the southeast one-quarter of the southeast one-quarter of Section 30, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., from Anna Helen York.
